name: Alec Bradley - Maxx Black - Gran Robusto
additionalNotes: The MAXX Black line was created in response to the demand for bigger and bolder cigar and now with its new look it is flying off the shelves nationwide. Dark and oily with an even draw, bringing good minerals to the palate along with spice and a charcoal note. These well-made cigars have a touch of semi-sweet chocolate that develops on the finish.
